text: At First Sight may refer to: *Prima facie, Latin expression meaning on its first encounter or at first sight *At First Sight (1917 film), 1917 American film *At First Sight (1999 film), 1999 American film *At First Sight (novel), 2005 novel by Nicholas Sparks *At First Sight, Violets Are Blue, 1987 album by The Stems
title: At First Sight
